ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: lol.  it IS a paladin only weapon.  bah nothing.
ygData.messageBody:
lol. it IS a paladin only weapon. bah nothing.

> From: "Justin Howard" <mhoward1@...>
>
> bah on that.... its just too tough to be paladin only.. maybe lower the
> stats a bit.... um it should be a lore , no drop etc....
> but paladin only?
> nah
>
